entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
